ROOT.QUERY: WITH VENDOR AS ( SELECT FOUCFIN FROM FOUDGENE@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE foutype=3 AND FOUCNUF in (''H091071'',''H091070'', ''H090061'')), FIND_PRODUCT AS ( SELECT socsite STORE_NUM, DEPT DEPT_NUM, pkstrucobj.get_cext@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1, objpere) SUB_CAT_CODE, pkstrucobj.get_desc@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1, objpere,''HN'') SUB_CAT_DESC, aracexr ITEM_CODE, pkartvl.get_vldesc@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1,araseqvl, ''HN'') ITEM_DESC, (select arccode from artcoca@Heinens_Custom_Prod where arccinr=aracinr and arccinv=pkartstock.RecupCinlUVC@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1,aracinl) and trunc(sysdate) between arcddeb and arcdfin and rownum=1) UPC, pkartstock.get_skuunits@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1,aracinl) PACK_SIZE, (SELECT sum(ul_nqteup) FROM TB_EUMS@HEINENS_STK_PROD, TB_LCUMS@HEINENS_STK_PROD WHERE ue_usscc = ul_usscc AND UL_CPROIN=aracexr -- AND UL_ILOGIS=aracexvl AND NVL(UE_STAPRE, 0) = 0 /* Only take into account available on hand (not in preparation)*/ AND UE_INDFIC = 1 ) INV_CASE_WHS, (SELECT SUM(NVL(storeai, 0) + NVL(storeal, 0) - NVL(storeav, 0) + NVL(storeae, 0) + NVL(storeac, 0) - NVL(storear, 0)) FROM stocouch@Heinens_Custom_Prod,artul@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE stosite=socsite AND aracinr=arucinr and arucinl=stocinl AND stotpos=0) INV_SKU_STORE, (SELECT to_char(MAX(stmdmvt),''MM/DD/RR'') FROM stomvt@Heinens_Custom_Prod,artul@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE stmsite=socsite AND arucinr=aracinr and arucinl=stmcinl AND stmtmvt=150) LAST_SALE FROM artuc@Heinens_Custom_Prod, VENDOR, strucrel@Heinens_Custom_Prod, sitdgene@Heinens_Custom_Prod, (SELECT ''102'' "DEPT" FROM dual UNION SELECT ''103'' "DEPT" FROM dual) WHERE aracfin=foucfin AND TRUNC(SYSDATE+1) BETWEEN araddeb AND aradfin AND aratcde=1 AND aratfou=1 AND objcint=aracinr AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN objddeb AND objdfin AND 55 > socsite AND soccmag=10 AND pkresrel.isSiteInReseau@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1,socsite, arasite) =1 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM stomvt@Heinens_Custom_Prod, artul@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE stmsite=socsite AND arucinr=aracinr and arucinl=stmcinl AND stmtmvt=150 AND TRUNC(stmdmvt)> TRUNC(SYSDATE-14)) AND NVL((SELECT sum(ul_nqteup) FROM TB_EUMS@HEINENS_STK_PROD, TB_LCUMS@HEINENS_STK_PROD WHERE ue_usscc = ul_usscc AND UL_CPROIN=aracexr AND NVL(UE_STAPRE, 0) =0),0) > 0) select * from FIND_PRODUCT where (DEPT_NUM LIKE ''102%'' OR DEPT_NUM LIKE ''103%'') AND INV_SKU_STORE=0
ROOT.HEADERIFEMPTY: No Item with inventory in warehouse
ROOT.HEADER: ADMIN - Count Store items not sold within 14 days and inventory in warehouse
